sentences.sContent: I wish I could offer you some cake but there’s none left.
sentences.sCn: 我真想能请你吃些蛋糕，但一点也没剩的了。

sentences.sContent: Although these were good students, none had a score above 60.
sentences.sCn: 虽然这些都是好学生，但是没有一个考到60分以上。

sentences.sContent: She waited for a reply, but none came.
sentences.sCn: 她等着答复，可是什么也没等到。

sentences.sContent: Even an old car is better than none.
sentences.sCn: 有一辆旧车也比没有车强。

sentences.sContent: I was none too pleased to have to take the exam again.
sentences.sCn: 我要重考一次，根本高兴不起来。

sentences.sContent: ...and none of the institutions believe they can sustain the risks of trying to break away by themselves...

trans.tranOther: not any amount of something or not one of a group of people or things
